mapper.select: SELECT room_id as roomId, res_starttime as startTime, res_endtime as endTime, is_spa as isSpa, is_mass as isMass, is_cup as isCup FROM t_order WHERE technician_id=#{technicianId} and order_status = 0 ORDER BY res_starttime ASC

SELECT sv.mons as month,sum(sv.sals)*0.3 as salary FROM (SELECT date_format(t_order.end_time,'%Y%m') as mons, t_order.sales_volume as sals FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_status = 2 AND t_order.technician_id =#{technicianId} ) as sv GROUP BY sv.mons

SELECT date_format(t_order.end_time,'%Y%m%d') as day, t_order.spa_amount as spaAmount, t_order.mass_amount as massAmount, t_order.cup_amount as cupAmount, t_order.sales_volume as salesVolume FROM t_order WHERE t_order.technician_id =#{technicianId} AND t_order.order_status = 2 order by t_order.end_time ASC

SELECT t_order.id, room_id AS roomId, t_order.technician_id AS technicianId, teuser. NAME AS technicianName, t_order.user_id AS userId, DATE_FORMAT( res_starttime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT( res_endtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS endTime, is_spa AS isSpa, is_mass AS isMass, is_cup AS isCup, size, home_num AS homeNum, reuser.mobile, reuser.`name`, reuser.type, technician.spa_charge AS spaCharge, technician.mass_charge AS massCharge, technician.cup_charge AS cupCharge, t_home.charge as homeCharge FROM t_order LEFT JOIN t_home ON t_home.id = t_order.room_id LEFT JOIN `user` AS reuser ON reuser.id = t_order.user_id LEFT JOIN technician ON technician.id = t_order.technician_id LEFT JOIN `user` AS teuser ON teuser.id = technician.user_id WHERE room_id=#{roomId} AND t_order.is_end = 0

SELECT tb.dt as day, `user`.`name` as name, tb.spa as spaAmount, tb.mas as massAmount, tb.cup as cupAmount, tb.vol as salesVolume From (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t_order.end_time,"%Y%m%d") as dt, t_order.technician_id as id, sum(t_order.spa_amount) as spa, sum(t_order.mass_amount) as mas, sum(t_order.cup_amount) as cup, sum(t_order.sales_volume) as vol FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t_order.end_time,"%Y%m%d"),t_order.technician_id ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(t_order.end_time,"%Y%m%d") ASC) tb,user WHERE tb.id=`user`.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t_order.end_time,"%Y%m") as month, sum(t_order.sales_volume) as income, sum(t_order.sales_volume)*0.3 as expense, sum(t_order.sales_volume)-sum(t_order.sales_volume)*0.3 as profit FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t_order.end_time,"%Y%m")

SELECT sv.mons as month, sum(sv.cupAmount) AS cupAmount, sum(sv.spaAmount) AS spaAmount, sum(sv.massAmount) AS massAmount FROM (SELECT date_format(t_order.end_time,'%m') as mons, t_order.sales_volume as sals, t_order.cup_amount AS cupAmount, t_order.spa_amount AS spaAmount, t_order.mass_amount AS massAmount FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_status = 2 AND t_order.end_time LIKE CONCAT(date_format(NOW(),'%Y'),"%")) as sv GROUP BY sv.mons,sv.cupAmount,sv.spaAmount,sv.massAmount

SELECT sv.mons AS MONTH, sum(sv.cupAmount) AS cupAmount, sum(sv.spaAmount) AS spaAmount, sum(sv.massAmount) AS massAmount, sum(sv.salesVolume) AS salesVolume, sum(sv.salesVolume)*0.3 AS wages, sum(sv.nodiscountSalesVolume) AS nodiscountSalesVolume FROM ( SELECT date_format(t_order.end_time, '%m') AS mons, t_order.sales_volume AS sals, t_order.cup_amount AS cupAmount, t_order.spa_amount AS spaAmount, t_order.mass_amount AS massAmount, t_order.sales_volume AS salesVolume, t_order.nodiscount_sales_volume AS nodiscountSalesVolume FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_status = 2 AND t_order.end_time LIKE CONCAT( date_format(NOW(), '%Y'), "%" ) ) AS sv GROUP BY sv.mons
